channel.title: Some VB newb questions
channel.description:
im new with visual basic :D i have soe questions,
I want to make it like: if you click on a button like ok you go to a other page from the program.., How do i make that?
And i want to have a button where u can click on and the program closes than.., how i can make that?
thank you, dont forget im new with vb so dont call me a fcking nub please :D

item.title: Some VB newb questions
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Drunk On Java, post:2, topic:10562”]For vb6:

go in command button_click add this (make form1 and form2)

Form2.Show
End Sub

To exit, add this:

Unload Me
End Sub

For vb2005:

Command1_click

Form2.Show()
End Sub

To exit:

Me.Close()[/quote]

Actually, I think you might be somewhat off on your VB 2005. I believe it’s something like this: (I’m on 2003 so I don’t know if it’s really a lot different.)

Private Sub Button1_Click(Byval etc etc…)
Dim NewForm as New Form2
Newform.show()
End Sub

Read full topic

item.title: Some VB newb questions
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

For vb6:

go in command button_click add this (make form1 and form2)

Form2.Show
End Sub

To exit, add this:

Unload Me
End Sub

For vb2005:

Command1_click

Form2.Show()
End Sub

To exit:

Me.Close()

Read full topic
